paper_abstract: This paper presents two illustrations of state space modeling in S-PLUS using the Ssf-Pack 3.0 routines implemented in S+FinMetrics 3.0. The state space modeling functions in S+FinMetrics/SsfPack are extremely flexible and powerful and can be used for a wide variety of linear Gaussian state space models and for some non-linear and non-Gaussian state space models.
paper_title: State Space Modeling Using SsfPack in S plus FinMetrics 3.0
